site.title: CS Skins - Game Item Marketplace
site.description: List and find game items for sale.

home.browse: Browse our collection of legendary game items. Contact us to purchase.
home.noItems: No items currently available. Check back soon!

adminSidebar.title: CS Skins Admin
adminSidebar.logoutDescription: You have been successfully logged out.

adminDashboard.manageDescription: Manage your game item listings and site settings from here.
adminDashboard.centralHub: This is your central hub for managing CS Skins. Use the navigation oscuro to explore different sections.
adminDashboard.itemListingsDescription: View, edit, or delete existing items.
adminDashboard.addItemDescription: Add a new game item to your catalog.

adminEditItem.itemNotFoundDescription: The item you are trying to edit does not exist.
adminEditItem.editItemDescription: Modify the details of the game item.

adminItems.pageDescription: View, edit, or add new game items.
adminItems.itemListingsDescription: A list of all items currently in the system.
adminItems.noItemsDescription: Get started by adding a new item.

deleteButton.confirmDescription: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the item "{name}".

labels.name: Item Name
labels.imageUrl: Image URL (Optional - will be auto-generated if left empty or placeholder)

placeholders.name: Excalibur
placeholders.shortDescription: A legendary sword of immense power.
placeholders.longDescription: Detailed lore and attributes of the item...
placeholders.imageUrl: Leave empty or https://placehold.co/600x400.png to auto-generate

validation.nameLength: Name must be at least 3 characters long.
validation.descriptionLength: Description must be at least 10 characters long.
validation.positivePrice: Price must be a positive number.
validation.formErrors: Please correct the errors in the form.

messages.imageAutoGenerate: An image will be auto-generated upon saving if this field is empty or a placeholder.

deleteConfirmation.title: Are you sure?
deleteConfirmation.description: This action cannot be undone. This will permanently delete the item "{name}".

adminLogin.title: Admin Login
adminLogin.description: Enter your credentials to access the admin panel.

messages.unexpectedError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

adminNewItem.pageDescription: Fill in the details for the new game item.
adminNewItem.detailsDescription: Provide all necessary information for the item.

itemDetail.notFoundDescription: The item you are looking for does not exist.
itemDetail.contactInfo: To purchase this item, please contact us directly.

contact.title: Contact Us
contact.description: Have questions or need assistance? Reach out to us using the form below or through our contact information.
contact.formDescription: Fill out the form below and we'll get back to you as soon as possible.

validation.emailValid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.contactMethodRequired: Please provide either an email or phone number
validation.messageLength: Message must be at least 10 characters

messages.successDescription: Thank you for your message. We'll get back to you soon.
messages.errorDescription: There was an error sending your message. Please try again.
